It,'s a good game and you can always get a match to play. Some of the controls could be better but this is how the game is for every one. Not had any issues getting the game to run good. Classic game.
is really good and fun game and is free soo yeah if u instal it u will see a great community behind this game and i hope my review is good

I've been sucked into the depth of hell we all like to call CS:GO. I've wasted thousands of dollars on stupid f***ing cases just to get a common drop every time, and queued up with idiots that can't even speak ENGLISH! This game drives me insane, and I'm now stuck in the toxic wastelands of Silver because I went 4 months without playing and lost my LEM rank, just to get placed in a match with a spin-bot to get LEM back and go 2/30. Over 900 people have f***ed my Mom, and apparently I'm an African American and have been diagnosed with over 15 types of cancer. F*** this game.

I love it more than my wife. 10/10 would recommend.
